verbose_text: Feed-forward inhibition was revealed by eliciting ANF- and PF mediated synaptic responses in voltage clamped fusiform cells held at -60 mV, a voltage between the reversal potentials for EPSCs and IPSCs (E Glu = 0 mV; E Cl = -85 mV).
evidence: mediated synaptic responses in voltage-clamped fusiform cells held at -60 mV
